Their signature rolls are way better but you also pay 15$ or 18$ for them, which i thought it was too much. The place is small but cute, love the decor and bathroom was clean! I went there because i was in the area and they had yelp deal, i got a free miso soup.
author: Marlyng P.

description: Sushi was sub par. I live just down the street and doubt I would ever come back. Although I will say that the number of positive reviews makes me think I was just unlucky when I went there. Nevertheless, I prefer Ace's and Asa (both nearby) for inexpensive sushi.
author: Lindsay B.

description: Friendly service, fresh food and good prices. I'm a happy girl! I have been disappointed by the quality of sushi in my neighborhood, but not at Sushi In!
author: Kari D.

description: Awesome fresh sushi! They have really good specialty rolls. Waitress was really attentive too. Sat at the bar and watched the sushi chef at work! Highly recommended!
author: martin t.

description: It's a small place but has great food.  The fish is fresh and presentation is awesome, I loved it and can't wait to go back!
author: Lena T.

description: I wandered into this place kind of on accident. I had a craving for sushi, was in the Marina, and went into the first place I saw. The place is tiny. There are four seats at the bar. I ordered a chirashi something rather and it was delicious. I'd go back if I was in the area again.
author: k h.

description: I've lived nearby for a while, but never tried Sushi in until recently. Now I'm hooked on their Iceland roll! There's lots of yummy fish and avocado. It keeps bring me back. They also have an easy to navigate online order system, which is a plus so I can order on the go!
author: Kelly N.

description: I really wanted to give Sushi IN a great review, but the service is not consistent. Yeah, service matters!
author: Mike B.

description: This review is from Zeina and Sam. First we apologize for taking so long to review Sushi IN. We LOVE this restaurant and go there at least once a week. Jackie is very talented and makes delicious sushi. The staff is super friendly and welcoming. Cute and cozy neighborhood restaurant!
author: Zeina F.

description: My husband and I decided to try this place tonight because they deliver and the weather was pretty nasty.  Well, I sort of wished we'd just ventured out to one of our regular spots in the rain.  The sushi rolls were OK but nothing special. The fireworks roll was really tasty and probably the best thing we ordered but for $14 it was rather small, no larger then a standard tuna roll.  With all of the awesome sushi places in the neighborhood we won't be going back to Sushi In for an overpriced mediocre meal.
author: Rebecca S.

description: The happy hour and the yelp coupon makes this a great deal. The food also stands on its own as being very good.
author: L N.

description: The food here is excellent quality.  I got a chicken teriaki meal with sushi.  I was really pleased with the quality of meat and the portions.  Highly recommend!
author: Gopa K.

description: Fantastic sushi, nice sake selection and wonderful staff! What else can you ask for. Probably one of the best sushi places in the Marina right now. The chef is amazing. He puts a lot of attention to detail with each plating. We ordered the omakase and the sashimi was very fresh. I wished I lived closer so I can come here more often. It's a smaller restaurant so it's packed on the weekends. Weekdays are less crowded since they just opened but that'll change soon once people start hearing about this place. They also offer delivery as well which is awesome when it's too cold outside and you're craving for some fresh sashimi and rolls. I highly recommend this place especially if you're in the area.
author: Louie A.

description: The sushi is delicious, the service is amazing, and the ambiance is cozy, non- pretentious. Awesome happy hour deals.
author: Sandra R.

description: Love the Chirashi bowl. Awesome if you want to try different flavors of the ocean/river. ;) Service is always great. Nice ambiance.
author: MaryAnne B.

description:
awesome happy hour, but just generally really great food.

these guys know what they're doing.
author: Dustin E.

description: I've been to Sushi IN a couple of times now and I have never been disappointed. The sashmi is as fresh as they get and Jacky the sushi chef is great at creating new rolls and dishes. I ordered the omakase and the fish was fresh and the price was reasonable. I will definitely continue coming here.
author: Diana K.

description: This place is killer - undiscovered gem in the middle of the marina.  Fireworks Roll is off the charts and service is excellent.  Well above expectations!  They do takeout and delivery as well.
author: Ian F.

description: SOOOOOOOOOOOOO GOOD i love this place! i will be back as soon as i can.
author: David R.
